title: Klinik Pergigian UTC
address: 23, 14, Jalan Bukit Mata Kuching, 93100 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: DP Media (dannyperon)
reviews.text: Minimum 1 week for appointment thru Mysejahtera Apps. Appointment slot only available after 10pm (as per describe by the staff). Walk-in accepted only for tooth extraction.

reviews.name: Aizaxc Official
reviews.text: Bad service. Saya buat appointment pukul 1015, then dtg pukol 1020. Dia tak nak ambil sbb dh terlepas jam. Atleast konsider sikit. Org dtg jauh. Please konsider sikit bukannya saya late over 1 hour.

reviews.name: Jui Loong Yap
reviews.text: My mother has a emergency tooth pain so we walk in the dental clinic for tooth checking and tooth extraction, I am surprised that all the nurses are male with no single female nurse spotted, all the male nurse were so nice to all the patients there, my mother get treated by the only male dentist in the clinic and that male dentist treat her very well, everything is smooth, comfortable and nice, the experience is not really different from a established private dental clinic.

reviews.name: Abby
reviews.text:
I visited this clinic a few days ago. I just did a walk-in as I wanted to get a tooth extraction. I came early, before 8 am, and waited until it opened. I paid RM 1 during registration and another RM 1 for the tooth extraction. In total, I only paid RM 2. The doctor was also nice and explained my teeth condition well, giving me the option to proceed or not.

At first, I was skeptical after reading some reviews here, but my experience was okay; nothing bad.

*Note: I came very early, and there weren't many people at the clinic at that time. The experience may differ for others who come during peak hours or busy times.

reviews.name: dental utc
reviews.text:
Temujanji tampalan (tampong/filling) dan penskaleran (cuci gigi/scaling) boleh dibuat melalui apps MySejahtera.
For enquiries, WHATSAPP ONLY. No calling please :)
Thank you!

reviews.name: shahiman sham
reviews.text: I already made appointment by mysejahtera it was very near to my office, for national health screening initiative, but the staff at the counter said we done provided this over here , I was like duh, but the apps appointed this UTC is available to do, hmm westing my time and petrol went this UTC, I hope the apps in mysejahtera remove this clinic on the list so that other people 🙄

reviews.name: Izzal Rahizam
reviews.text: Does UTC dental clinic offer periodontal treatment? I really need treatment ASAP.

reviews.text: A very experienced dentist. The best dentist in Kuching if you want to extract your wisdom tooth. Done in less than 15 minutes, and best of all no swelling at all the next day. Definitely recommended for those who needs wisdom tooth or normal extractions

reviews.text: Skillful and very experienced Dentist in doing dental extraction, wisdom tooth extraction and dental surgery. Cheaper price compare to other place. I went there in year 2022 for 2nd molar tooth extraction.

reviews.name: nini
reviews.text: Do not. and Just go find another dental clinic for braces treatment. From my experience, they are only one room and one Dr for patients to do their treatments and there are usually a lot of people queueing even though I have made an appointment.  People just go in and out after one another for their treatment in that room. Guess what. Obviously, the tools are not even cleaned as they should be because they have no time to clean those and sterilize them for the next person. When I agreed to do my braces there, the Dr straight away do the mold and ask to come to do 4 extractions on the next appointment. WITHOUT any X-TRAY, clear consultation, and observation. 4 extraction in one go is an absolutely insane recommendation. A person recommended this clinic because it is the cheapest in Kuching but tbh the worst you can ever imagine. I am so sorry for this and hope this clinic can improve on their hygiene and professionality. I changed my mind before it is too late and did not want to come to this clinic ever again.

reviews.name: anson pan
reviews.text:
I recently visited life dental clinic and had an excellent experience from start to finish. The front desk staff was friendly and efficient with scheduling and insurance questions.
Dr Davina was thorough, gentle, professional, and skillful. She took the time to explain my treatment options and gave me the best advice for my dental treatment. I always used to be scared of dental treatments, but here I felt comfortable and at ease.
The clinic itself is clean, modern, and has a calming atmosphere. The clinic is also kids-friendly, with a slide for the children to enjoy.
Wait times were minimal, and I was seen right on schedule. They even sent a helpful follow-up text with care instructions afterward.
Overall, I highly recommend this dental clinic for their professional service, caring approach, and state-of-the-art care. I’ll definitely be returning for my future dental needs.

reviews.name: Syl141
reviews.text: Excellent service in a cosy environment. The doctor is very warm and friendly in explaining every meticulous detail to the patient. I always dread going to the dentist but overall I had a lovely experience. Would definitely come here again if I have any dental issues. 10/10.

reviews.name: Rakhaal Aariann
reviews.text: I've always had a fear of the dentist and have been putting off visits for a long time. However, Dr. Davina made me feel completely safe and comfortable throughout the entire procedure. Her care and understanding truly helped ease my anxiety. I highly recommend her to anyone who feels nervous about dental visits!

reviews.name: Jun eeN
reviews.text: Excellent service and friendly staff! The clinic was clean, and the dentist was very professional and gentle. They explained everything clearly and made me feel comfortable throughout the visit. Highly recommend for anyone looking for quality dental care!

reviews.name: Ho Kp
reviews.text: Friendly doctor and nurses that will calm your kids down.

reviews.name: TOM HARRISON
reviews.text:
Since first visiting Dr Davina and her team many years ago I was hooked by the friendly and professional service.
Now, whenever I receive a dental quote in Australia I head for an airline then hotel booking site.
It's amazing how I can get great dental care AND a short holiday for less than the price of a visit to an Australian dentist.
To clarify, the Australian quote wasn't for a single filling but I am sure you follow my drift ( although a single filling at some Australian dentists might qualify for a trip to Kuching ).
I have heard all the horror stories about leaving Australia for medical treatment but I can truly say that all my treatments here never required follow up treatment back in Australia.
Keep up the excellent work.

reviews.name: james Handfield-Jones
reviews.text: Well done Life Dental! You've made dentistry as close to fun as its likely to get. With the stereo headphones playing your favourite music the chair reclines to reveal a soothing video projected onto the ceiling. Pain relief is a priority and the quality of the work is good. The clinic is clean, modern and newly fitted out. Try it!

reviews.name: Lai Desmond
reviews.text:
This was my first experience getting a tooth filling at this clinic, and it was a great one! The dentist (unfortunately, I forgot to ask her name) was very patient and thorough in checking my teeth, explaining which ones needed fillings, and ensuring I understood the process. The pricing was surprisingly affordable, which was a pleasant surprise!

The clinic environment was calm and comfortable, with a big TV to keep me distracted—definitely a great touch, especially during the drilling part! I also really appreciated the orange eye protection glasses, which helped shield my eyes from the bright machine light.

The dentist was incredibly gentle, making sure the procedure was as painless as possible. Overall, I had a very positive experience, and I would definitely recommend this clinic to anyone looking for quality dental care!

reviews.name: Nala
reviews.text:
I visited this dental clinic last week, and I really wish more people knew how amazing it is. The doctor was very helpful, friendly, and gentle while checking my teeth — I felt really comfortable throughout the session.

The staff were also super kind and welcoming. Honestly, coming from my area, it’s quite rare for people to find this clinic because there are already so many other clinics nearby. But I decided to give this one a try even though it’s over 30 minutes away — and I’m really glad I did.

I didn’t get the chance to fix my broken tooth here since my mom had already booked an appointment at another clinic without my knowing. I only had a check-up, an X-ray, and got some medicine, but they followed up the next day to ask how I was feeling after taking the medication. That kind of care is really appreciated.

Definitely worth checking out if you’re looking for a gentle and kind dental team.

address: 2821, Beside Public Bank 3rd Miles, 2819, Jalan Rock, Central Park Commercial Centre, 93200 Kuching, Malaysia

reviews.name: John Chen
reviews.text: Had checkup and scaling done by Dr. Tang. Friendly doctor and good service. No complaints. Took a normal amount of time, about half an hour.

reviews.name: Chris Chai
reviews.text:
I don’t usually like leaving bad reviews, but feel it’s important to share this experience.

The young male dentist used a sharp tool to lift my upper lip by stabbing the area behind my philtrum (near my upper frenulum). He did this to lift my upper lip out of the way to work on my upper teeth. Apart from applying quite a lot of force, he also held it in place for quite a while.

Two days later, this area is still sore. I initially gave him the benefit of the doubt, trusting his approach, though it was rather painful when my upper lip was held in place by the sharp object.

My teeth now feel unusually sensitive, especially with cold drinks, an issue I’ve never really had before. His handling was rough; the scaling was uncomfortable.

Like a previous reviewer mentioned about short service times, he only spent 15 minutes on scaling and polishing. My appointment was at 4 p.m., and he appeared rushed, leaving about 10 minutes after finishing, before I even had time to make payment while waiting in the foyer.

I’ve had positive experiences with other dentists here, including a female dentist who was attentive and quite gentle in her approach. The front desk staff is friendly, and I appreciated the reminders for my appointment.

However, after this experience, I’ll be looking for a new clinic. I will now have to consult another clinic to ensure my teeth are ok, and the area behind my upper lip isn’t at risk of infection, as the stabbing was quite deep, it’s still sore, and my teeth are very sensitive right now.

reviews.name: Joanna E
reviews.text: I did polish and scaling here. I am not so satisfied with their service. The dentist took only 5 minutes to do everything and I left feeling so unclean & unsatisfied. Maybe less than 10. Usually when i do P&S, my previous dentist would take about 45 minutes to do everything. This one felt like they were just giving their bare minimum. I feel like I can just go home and brush my own teeth. Not bad, but it's just not for me.

reviews.name: Brian Lu
reviews.text: Best dental clinic in the world!

reviews.name: Grace Yong
reviews.text: I am pretty old school - just 'tahan' the pain and all will be well. So you can imagine, a visit to the dentist is not a pleasant experience. However, a visit to Wise Dental Clinic changed that perception completely. I did a full porcelain crown and the experience was 100% positive - it was completely pain free! 🙌 Dr Keith is an empathetic and caring dentist. He checked on me throughout the procedure, ensuring that I was ok. Though young, his skill, control and knowledge shows his deep understanding and passion for his vocation. Even the support staff from the receptionist to the dental nurses are well trained, caring and friendly. Teck-wise, Wise Dental seem to have it all - the latest gadgets and machines. From the reception's warm interior, to the bite block & red-tinted glasses, all of these offered a nice level of comfort for their patients. I am glad I took a leap of faith to try them out. It's been a month and my new crown feels like second nature. If you do give them a try, do wear something thicker because it can get quite cold sitting in the dental chair. Thanks Wise Dental!

reviews.name: Joyce Chai
reviews.text: Great experience of wisdom tooth extraction, no pain at all. The caring and confidence dentist, Dr Lenna, made the patient feel comfortable and secured. Highly recommended.
